data.text:
Welcome to Rare Paper

We offer a broad selection of Slavic and Eastern European books, photographs, and ephemera with an emphasis on Russian & Ukrainian émigré materials. Our personal collecting and research interests focus on the print culture of Ukrainian displaced persons in post-war Germany.

Sergei Gerasimov: 40 let tvorcheskoi deiatelnosti. Katalog vystavki [40 Years of Creative Endeavors: The Exhibition Catalog of Sergey Gerasimov]

Moscow: Directorate of Art Exhibitions and Panoramas, 1945. Textual wrappers. Item #664

17 x 12.5 cm. 12 pages: 4 black and white plates. One of 500 copies. Text in Russian. Very good copy.

This monograph delves into the captivating world of Sergey Vasilyevich Gerasimov (1885-1964), a prominent Soviet and Russian painter whose artistic journey is a testament to his evolution as an artist. As a student of the renowned Konstantin Korovin, Gerasimov inherited a legacy of artistic excellence, which he would go on to shape and transform in his own unique way.

Price: $120.00

See all items in Exhibition Catalogs, Soviet (USSR)
